mapper.update: update oa_resource set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, acitve = #{acitve,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, name, org_id, type, url, permission, order_num, icon, create_time, modify_time, acitve from oa_resource where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, parent_id, name, org_id, type, url, permission, order_num, icon, create_time, modify_time, acitve from oa_resource
